name: Boneless Wings
description: Tender boneless chicken pieces deep fried in crisp bread powder.

name: Double Crunch Buffalo Wings
description: Twice battered and fried, these crisp outside, tender inside wings are super spicy and 100% organic

name: Top Sirloin Steak
description: Tender, juicy and freshly sauteed sirloin steak, medium rare made and sprinkled with red wine.

name: Bourbon Street Steak
description: Big flavor from New Orleans. USDA select 100% fresh sirloin steak jazzed up with Cajun spices and garlic butter served sizzling on a cast iron platter with sauteed mushrooms and onions.

name: Bud light
description: A 12-ounce bottle has 4.2 percent alcohol with a malt and hops ratio different from Budweiser

name: Heineken
description: A 12-ounce bottle has 5 percent alcohol and is a pale lager beer.

name: Brownie Bite
description: The perfect size of a warm dark chocolate brownie with nuts served with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with hot fudge.

name: Blue Ribbon Brownie
description: Warm dark chocolate brownie with nuts. Served with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with hot fudge.

name: House Salad
description: Hearts of romaine, tomatoes, cucumbers, celery, carrots and balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Hearts of romaine tossed with Parmesan and garlic croutons.
